name: Plague of Trickery
description:
Gamejam submission for community gamejam - HI BLACKTHORNPROD and DANI.

The greates trickster gods of the known world joined forces and released a plague on humanity.  You have journeyed to their lair to defeat the trickster gods and restore the world... blah blah blah.

Bullet hell boss rush against the gods of trickery. ENJOY!

wasd/arrows to move.  hold mouse to aim and charge attack.  release mouse to attack.  Your attacks will allow you to dash through bullets and damage anything you hit.

I am a student at CMU and I did this game by myself during the first week of classes.  

Thank you for playing.

NOTE: i have a mac version but it didnt get uploaded in time ;-;
